lead_paragraph: Real Madrid Coach José Mourinho has been barred for one Champions League match for instructing players to get deliberate red cards so they could serve suspensions in a meaningless game.
snippet: Real Madrid Coach José Mourinho has been barred for one Champions League match for instructing players to get deliberate red cards so they could serve suspensions in a meaningless game.

headline.main: Real Madrid Coach Barred for One Game
headline.print_headline: Real Madrid Coach Barred for One Game
